name: Rafael Valencia-García
content: inicio [RAFAEL VALENCIA GARCIA] Menú principal Menú principal Investigación Contacto Main menu Home page Research Contact Biography Rafael Valencia García was born in Murcia on Dec 6, 1977. He received a Bs degree in Computer Science from the University of Murcia in 1999, and a Ms degree in Computer Engineering from the same university in 2001. He obtained a European PhD degree in Computer Engineering in 2005 from the University of Murcia. He is a Full Professor in the Department of Informatics and Systems. Research summary Research interests Natural Language Processing Emotion analysis Hate speech detection Author profiling Semantic Web technologies Ontologies Knowledge acquisition inicio.txt Última modificación: 2024/07/08 16:45por valencia@um.es
